name: Isometric Shooter Demo
description:
This is a small isometric demo intended to mimic some of the basic mechanics of a recent hit roguelike! Currently the features are shooting, reloading, dashing, and movement for the player. There is also a basic target that moves on a static track for the player to shoot at.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to dash (You can dash twice rapidly. You can dash through obstacles.)

Left click to shoot (Press or hold for automatic. You have 10 bullets.)

R to reload (You will automatically reload when attempting to shoot without ammo.)
